mn102:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn102:2.1: “santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana aparantakappika aparantanuditthino aparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhivuttipadani abhivadanti.
mn102:2.8: sato va pana sattassa ucchedam vinasam vibhavam pannapenti, ditthadhammanibbanam va paneke abhivadanti.
mn102:2.9: Iti santam va attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, sato va pana sattassa ucchedam vinasam vibhavam pannapenti, ditthadhammanibbanam va paneke abhivadanti.
mn102:2.10: Iti imani panca hutva tini honti, tini hutva panca honti—
mn102:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, ekattasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nanattasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, parittasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, appamanasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, etam va panekesam upativattatam vinnanakasinameke abhivadanti appamanam anenjam.
mn102:4.2: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, ekattasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nanattasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, parittasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, appamanasannim va te bhonto samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, ya va panetasam sannanam parisuddha parama agga anuttariya akkhayati—
mn102:4.3: yadi rupasannanam yadi arupasannanam yadi ekattasannanam yadi nanattasannanam.
mn102:4.5: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:4.6: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana.
mn102:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti.
mn102:6.3: Sanna rogo sanna gando sanna sallam, etam santam etam panitam yadidam: ‘asannan’ti.
mn102:7.2: ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana.
mn102:7.3: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya:
mn102:7.4: ‘ahamannatra rupa, annatra vedanaya, annatra sannaya, annatra sankharehi, vinnanassa agatim va gatim va cutim va upapattim va vuddhim va virulhim va vepullam va pannapessami’ti—
mn102:7.6: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:7.7: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:8.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana.
mn102:9.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti.
mn102:9.3: Sanna rogo sanna gando sanna sallam, asanna sammoho, etam santam etam panitam yadidam:
mn102:10.2: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, arupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, rupinca arupinca va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana, nevarupim narupim va te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana.
mn102:10.3: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va ditthasutamutavinnatabbasankharamattena etassa ayatanassa upasampadam pannapenti, byasananhetam, bhikkhave, akkhayati etassa ayatanassa upasampadaya.
mn102:10.6: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:10.7: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:11.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana sato sattassa ucchedam vinasam vibhavam pannapenti, tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana sannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samanabrahmana asannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti, yepi te bhonto samanabrahmana nevasanninasannim attanam pannapenti arogam param marana tesamete patikkosanti.
mn102:11.3: Sabbepime bhonto samanabrahmana uddham saram asattimyeva abhivadanti:
mn102:12.1: Seyyathapi nama vanijassa vanijjaya gacchato evam hoti:
mn102:12.2: ‘ito me idam bhavissati, imina idam lacchami’ti;
mn102:12.3: evamevime bhonto samanabrahmana vanijupama manne patibhanti:
mn102:12.6: Ye kho te bhonto samanabrahmana sato sattassa ucchedam vinasam vibhavam pannapenti te sakkayabhaya sakkayaparijeguccha sakkayanneva anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti.
mn102:12.7: Seyyathapi nama sa gaddulabaddho dalhe thambhe va khile va upanibaddho, tameva thambham va khilam va anuparidhavati anuparivattati;
mn102:12.8: evamevime bhonto samanabrahmana sakkayabhaya sakkayaparijeguccha sakkayanneva anuparidhavanti anuparivattanti.
mn102:12.9: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:12.10: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:13.1: Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va aparantakappika aparantanuditthino aparantam arabbha anekavihitani adhivuttipadani abhivadanti, sabbe te imaneva pancayatanani abhivadanti etesam va annataram.
mn102:14.1: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samanabrahmana pubbantakappika pubbantanuditthino pubbantam arabbha anekavihitani adhivuttipadani abhivadanti.
mn102:14.2: ‘Sassato atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.3: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘asassato atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.4: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘sassato ca asassato ca atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.5: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nevasassato nasassato atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.6: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘antava atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.7: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘anantava atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.8: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘antava ca anantava ca atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.9: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nevantava nanantava atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.10: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekattasanni atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.11: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘nanattasanni atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.12: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘parittasanni atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.13: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘appamanasanni atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.14: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekantasukhi atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.15: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘ekantadukkhi atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.16: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘sukhadukkhi atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:14.17: ittheke abhivadanti, ‘adukkhamasukhi atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti—
mn102:15.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn102:15.2: ‘sassato atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti, tesam vata annatreva saddhaya annatra ruciya annatra anussava annatra akaraparivitakka annatra ditthinijjhanakkhantiya paccattamyeva nanam bhavissati parisuddham pariyodatanti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn102:15.3: Paccattam kho pana, bhikkhave, nane asati parisuddhe pariyodate yadapi te bhonto samanabrahmana tattha nanabhagamattameva pariyodapenti tadapi tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam upadanamakkhayati.
mn102:15.4: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:15.5: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:16.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ye te samanabrahmana evamvadino evamditthino:
mn102:16.2: ‘asassato atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannan’ti …pe…
mn102:16.3: sassato ca asassato ca atta ca loko ca …
mn102:16.4: nevasassato nasassato atta ca loko ca …
mn102:16.7: antava ca anantava ca atta ca loko ca …
mn102:16.8: nevantava nanantava atta ca loko ca …
mn102:16.16: adukkhamasukhi atta ca loko ca, idameva saccam moghamannanti, tesam vata annatreva saddhaya annatra ruciya annatra anussava annatra akaraparivitakka annatra ditthinijjhanakkhantiya paccattamyeva nanam bhavissati parisuddham pariyodatanti—netam thanam vijjati.
mn102:16.17: Paccattam kho pana, bhikkhave, nane asati parisuddhe pariyodate yadapi te bhonto samanabrahmana tattha nanabhagamattameva pariyodapenti tadapi tesam bhavatam samanabrahmananam upadanamakkhayati.
mn102:16.18: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:16.19: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:17.1: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekam pitim upasampajja viharati:
mn102:17.2: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam pavivekam pitim upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:17.4: Pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati domanassam, domanassassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti.
mn102:18.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam chaya jahati tam atapo pharati, yam atapo jahati tam chaya pharati;
mn102:18.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati domanassam, domanassassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti.
mn102:18.4: Ayam kho bhavam samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekam pitim upasampajja viharati:
mn102:18.5: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam pavivekam pitim upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:18.7: Pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati domanassam, domanassassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti.
mn102:18.8: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:18.9: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:19.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama niramisam sukham upasampajja viharati:
mn102:19.2: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam niramisam sukham upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:19.4: Niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti, pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham.
mn102:20.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam chaya jahati tam atapo pharati, yam atapo jahati tam chaya pharati;
mn102:20.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti, pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham.
mn102:20.4: Ayam kho bhavam samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama, niramisam sukham upasampajja viharati:
mn102:20.5: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam niramisam sukham upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:20.7: Niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati paviveka piti, pavivekaya pitiya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham.
mn102:20.8: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:20.9: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:21.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama, niramisassa sukhassa samatikkama, adukkhamasukham vedanam upasampajja viharati:
mn102:21.2: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam adukkhamasukham vedanam upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:21.4: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham, niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati adukkhamasukha vedana.
mn102:22.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, yam chaya jahati tam atapo pharati, yam atapo jahati tam chaya pharati;
mn102:22.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham, niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati adukkhamasukha vedana.
mn102:22.4: Ayam kho bhavam samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama, niramisassa sukhassa samatikkama, adukkhamasukham vedanam upasampajja viharati:
mn102:22.5: ‘etam santam etam panitam yadidam adukkhamasukham vedanam upasampajja viharami’ti.
mn102:22.7: Adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya nirodha uppajjati niramisam sukham, niramisassa sukhassa nirodha uppajjati adukkhamasukha vedana.
mn102:22.8: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:22.9: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:23.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama, niramisassa sukhassa samatikkama, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya samatikkama:
mn102:24.2: Ayam kho bhavam samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthinanca patinissagga, aparantanuditthinanca patinissagga, sabbaso kamasamyojananam anadhitthana, pavivekaya pitiya samatikkama, niramisassa sukhassa samatikkama, adukkhamasukhaya vedanaya samatikkama:
mn102:24.5: Atha ca panayam bhavam samano va brahmano va pubbantanuditthim va upadiyamano upadiyati, aparantanuditthim va upadiyamano upadiyati, kamasamyojanam va upadiyamano upadiyati, pavivekam va pitim upadiyamano upadiyati, niramisam va sukham upadiyamano upadiyati, adukkhamasukham va vedanam upadiyamano upadiyati.
mn102:24.7: ‘santohamasmi, nibbutohamasmi, anupadanohamasmi’ti samanupassati tadapi imassa bhoto samanassa brahmanassa upadanamakkhayati.
mn102:24.8: ‘Tayidam sankhatam olarikam atthi kho pana sankharanam nirodho atthetan’ti—
mn102:24.9: iti viditva tassa nissaranadassavi tathagato tadupativatto.
mn102:25.1: Idam kho pana, bhikkhave, tathagatena anuttaram santivarapadam abhisambuddham yadidam—
mn102:25.2: channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimokkho”ti.
mn102:25.4: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
